net.trajano.ms.oidc.internal

Class ServerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.ms.oidc.internal.ServerState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ServerState
extends Object
implements Serializable
    State that is stored on the cache. Mapped by a new token. The reason a new token was used rather than relying on the nonce is to avoid making the call to the IP to validate the nonce.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
